TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_adv_selection
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool advisor selection form table - stores the data from the forms which students submit for advisor selection.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student.

FIELD.NAME: keep_current
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the student selects to keep their current advisor.

FIELD.NAME: option1id
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student's first selection.

FIELD.NAME: option2id
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student's second selection.

FIELD.NAME: option3id
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student's third selection.

FIELD.NAME: option4id
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student's fourth selection.

FIELD.NAME: option5id
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student's fifth selection.

FIELD.NAME: selectedid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the advisor selected for the student.

FIELD.NAME: time_created
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the record was first created.

FIELD.NAME: time_modified
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the record was last modified.

KEY.NAME: user
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student.

KEY.NAME: option1
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student's first selection.

KEY.NAME: option2
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student's second selection.

KEY.NAME: option3
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student's third selection.

KEY.NAME: option4
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student's fourth selection.

KEY.NAME: option5
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student's fifth selection.

KEY.NAME: selected
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the advisor selected for the student.

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_comment
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool weekend comment table - stores comments which dorm faculty add to weekend check-in reports.

FIELD.NAME: weekendid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the weekend associated with the record.

FIELD.NAME: dormid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the dorm associated with the record.

FIELD.NAME: comment
FIELD.COMMENT: The comment text for the record.

KEY.NAME: weekend
KEY.COMMENT: The weekend record associated with the record.

KEY.NAME: dorm
KEY.COMMENT: The dorm record associated with the record.

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_dorm
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool dorm table - stores the data associated with each dorm and day house.

FIELD.NAME: hohid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the dorm's head of house.

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the dorm record has been deleted and shouldn't be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the dorm.

FIELD.NAME: abbreviation
FIELD.COMMENT: The abbreviation for the dorm.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the dorm is a boarding dorm or a day house {"Boarding", "Day", "All"}.

FIELD.NAME: gender
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the dorm is a boys dorm or a girls dorm {"Boys", "Girls", "All"}.

FIELD.NAME: available
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the dorm is currently available for students to live in.

FIELD.NAME: permissions_line
FIELD.COMMENT: The phone number that should be called for permissions purposes.

KEY.NAME: hoh
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the dorm's head of house.

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_esignout
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool esignout table - stores the data from eSignout forms.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student associated with the record.

FIELD.NAME: driverid
FIELD.COMMENT: The esignout id of driver record associated with the record - an equal id value and driverid value indicate that this record is a driver record.

FIELD.NAME: approverid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the faculty granting permission for the record.

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the esignout record has been deleted and shouldn't be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of the esignout record. {"Driver", "Passenger", "Parent", entered string}

FIELD.NAME: passengers
FIELD.COMMENT: JSON formatted list of passengers for a driver record - NULL if not a driver.

FIELD.NAME: destination
FIELD.COMMENT: The student's destination - NULL indicates a passenger inheriting the value from the driver.

FIELD.NAME: departure_time
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for departure date and time - NULL indicates a passenger inheriting the value from the driver.

FIELD.NAME: sign_in_time
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the student signs in - NULL indicates that the student has not signed in.

FIELD.NAME: time_created
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the record was first created.

FIELD.NAME: time_modified
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the record was last modified.

KEY.NAME: student
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student associated with the record.

KEY.NAME: driver
KEY.COMMENT: The esignout record of the driver associated with the record.

KEY.NAME: approver
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the faculty who approved the record.

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_faculty
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool faculty table - stores the data associated with each faculty.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the faculty.

FIELD.NAME: dormid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the faculty's dorm, if the faculty is a dorm faculty.

FIELD.NAME: faculty_code
FIELD.COMMENT: The faculty's 5 character code from Senior Systems.

FIELD.NAME: may_approve_signout
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the faculty may approve student sign out {1, 0}.

FIELD.NAME: advisory_available
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the faculty's advisory is accepting new advisees {1, 0}.

FIELD.NAME: advisory_closing
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the faculty's advisory is going to close and all students must switch out of it {1, 0}.

KEY.NAME: user
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the faculty.

KEY.NAME: dorm
KEY.COMMENT: The dorm record of the faculty's dorm, if the faculty is a dorm faculty.

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_notification
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool email notification table - stores data associated with different types of email notifications.

FIELD.NAME: class
FIELD.COMMENT: The string identifier for the notification type.

FIELD.NAME: subject
FIELD.COMMENT: The subject line for the email.

FIELD.NAME: body_html
FIELD.COMMENT: The full html for the body of the email with styling inline.

KEY.NAME: class
KEY.COMMENT: The string identifier for the notification type.

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_parent
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool parent table - stores the data associated with students' parents.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the parent's student.

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the parent record has been deleted and shouldn't be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: is_primary_parent
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the parent is the student's primary parent.

FIELD.NAME: relationship
FIELD.COMMENT: The parent's relationship with their student.

FIELD.NAME: parent_name
FIELD.COMMENT: The parent's full name, including saluations.

FIELD.NAME: home_phone
FIELD.COMMENT: The parent's home phone number.

FIELD.NAME: cell_phone
FIELD.COMMENT: The parent's cell phone number.

FIELD.NAME: work_phone
FIELD.COMMENT: The parent's work phone number.

FIELD.NAME: email
FIELD.COMMENT: The parent's email address.

KEY.NAME: student
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the parent's student.

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_permissions
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool student permissions table - stores the data assocaited with students' permissions.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student associated with the record.

FIELD.NAME: overnight
FIELD.COMMENT: May the student stay overnight? {"parent", "host"}.

FIELD.NAME: license_date
FIELD.COMMENT: A timestamp which indicates the issue date of license of the student associated with the record. This should only be added to day students as it makes them valid drivers for car registration and eSignout.

FIELD.NAME: may_drive_to_town
FIELD.COMMENT: May the student drive to town during the day? {"Yes", "No"}.

FIELD.NAME: may_drive_passengers
FIELD.COMMENT: May the student give rides to other students? {"Yes", "No"}.

FIELD.NAME: may_ride_with
FIELD.COMMENT: With whom may the student ride? {"Parent Permission", "Over 21", "Any Driver", "Specific Drivers"}.

FIELD.NAME: ride_permission_details
FIELD.COMMENT: Text field to be used if riding permissions are granted for specific drivers or to note other considerations.

FIELD.NAME: ride_share
FIELD.COMMENT: May the student use ride sharing services? {"Yes", "No", "Parent"}.

FIELD.NAME: may_drive_to_boston
FIELD.COMMENT: May the student go to Boston? {"Yes", "No", "Parent"}.

FIELD.NAME: swim_competent
FIELD.COMMENT: Is the student able to swim competently? {"Yes", "No"}.

FIELD.NAME: swim_allowed
FIELD.COMMENT: Is the student allowed to swim? {"Yes", "No"}.

FIELD.NAME: boat_allowed
FIELD.COMMENT: Is the student allowed in a boat? {"Yes", "No"}.

KEY.NAME: student
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student associated with the record.

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_rooming
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool rooming request form table - stores the data from the forms which students submit to request rooming.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student.

FIELD.NAME: room_type
FIELD.COMMENT: The requested room type {"Single", "Double", "Quad"}.

FIELD.NAME: dormmate1id
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student's first dormmate request.

FIELD.NAME: dormmate2id
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student's second dormmate request.

FIELD.NAME: dormmate3id
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student's third dormmate request.

FIELD.NAME: dormmate4id
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student's fourth dormmate request.

FIELD.NAME: dormmate5id
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student's fifth dormmate request.

FIELD.NAME: dormmate6id
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student's sixth dormmate request.

FIELD.NAME: has_lived_in_double
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the student has lived in a one-room double in the past.

FIELD.NAME: preferred_roommateid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student's preferred roommate.

FIELD.NAME: time_created
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the record was first created.

FIELD.NAME: time_modified
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the record was last modified.

KEY.NAME: user
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student.

KEY.NAME: dormmate1
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student's first dormmate request.

KEY.NAME: dormmate2
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student's second dormmate request.

KEY.NAME: dormmate3
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student's third dormmate request.

KEY.NAME: dormmate4
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student's fourth dormmate request.

KEY.NAME: dormmate5
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student's fifth dormmate request.

KEY.NAME: dormmate6
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student's sixth dormmate request.

KEY.NAME: preferred_roommate
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student's preferred roommate.

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_student
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool student table - stores the data assocaited with each student.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student.

FIELD.NAME: dormid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the student's dorm.

FIELD.NAME: advisorid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student's advisor.

FIELD.NAME: admission_year
FIELD.COMMENT: The year the student entered Middlesex.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The current grade of the student {9, 10, 11, 12}.

FIELD.NAME: gender
FIELD.COMMENT: The gender of the student.

FIELD.NAME: boarding_status
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the student is a boarding student or a day student {Boarder, Day}.

FIELD.NAME: boarding_status_next_year
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the student will be a boarding student or a day student next year {Boarder, Day}.

FIELD.NAME: room
FIELD.COMMENT: The student's room in their dorm.

FIELD.NAME: phone_number
FIELD.COMMENT: The student's cell phone number.

FIELD.NAME: birthday
FIELD.COMMENT: The student's birthdate {mm/dd}.

KEY.NAME: user
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student.

KEY.NAME: dorm
KEY.COMMENT: The dorm record of the student's dorm.

KEY.NAME: advisor
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student's advisor.

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_vehicle
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool student vehicle table - stores the data of all registered day student vehicles.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student associated with the record.

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the vehicle record has been deleted and shouldn't be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: make
FIELD.COMMENT: The make of the vehicle.

FIELD.NAME: model
FIELD.COMMENT: The model of the vehicle.

FIELD.NAME: color
FIELD.COMMENT: The color of the vehicle.

FIELD.NAME: registration
FIELD.COMMENT: The registration of the vehicle.

KEY.NAME: student
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student associated with the record.

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_vt_site
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool vacation travel site table - stores the available sites for mx transportation.

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the site record has been deleted and shouldn't be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the site.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of the site. {Plane, Train, Bus, NYC Direct}

FIELD.NAME: enabled_departure
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the site is enabled for departure transportation.

FIELD.NAME: enabled_return
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the site is enabled for return transportation.

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_vt_transport
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool departure / return table - stores data associated with a student's departure or return transportation.

FIELD.NAME: mx_transportation
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the student will be using Middlesex transportation.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of transportation {Car, Plane, Bus, Train, NYC Direct, Non-MX Bus}.

FIELD.NAME: siteid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the site which the student is traveling to or from - 0 indicates an 'other' option - NULL indicates an unspecified site.

FIELD.NAME: details
FIELD.COMMENT: Text to provide more information for the student's travel

FIELD.NAME: carrier
FIELD.COMMENT: The carrier or company for the transportation.

FIELD.NAME: transportation_number
FIELD.COMMENT: The flight, train, or bus number of the transportation.

FIELD.NAME: date_time
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the student is leaving or returning to campus.

FIELD.NAME: international
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the departing flight is international or the student is clearing customs in Boston on the return flight.

KEY.NAME: site
KEY.COMMENT: The site record for the site which the student is traveling to or from.

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_vt_trip
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool vacation travel trip relational table - stores the data for a student's basic info and links to their departure and return records.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student associated with the record.

FIELD.NAME: departureid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the departure record associated with this record - 0 indicates no departure record.

FIELD.NAME: returnid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the return record associated with this record - 0 indicates no return record.

FIELD.NAME: destination
FIELD.COMMENT: The student's destination.

FIELD.NAME: phone_number
FIELD.COMMENT: The phone number to contact.

FIELD.NAME: time_created
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the record was first created.

FIELD.NAME: time_modified
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the record was last modified.

KEY.NAME: student
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student associated with the record.

KEY.NAME: departure
KEY.COMMENT: The departure record associated with this record.

KEY.NAME: return
KEY.COMMENT: The return record associated with this record.

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_weekend
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool weekend table - stores data associated with each weekend for use wuth weekend check-in reports and weekend forms.

FIELD.NAME: sunday_time
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp (server time) for the Sunday of the weekend.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of the weekend {"Open", "Closed", "Free", "Vacation"}.

FIELD.NAME: start_time
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp (server time) of 0:00:00 on the day the weekend starts (options are Wednesday - Saturday).

FIELD.NAME: end_time
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp (server time) of 23:59:59 on the day the weekend ends (options are Sunday - Tuesday).

TABLE.NAME: local_mxschool_weekend_form
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool weekend form table - stores the data from the forms which students submit for weekend permissions.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student who submitted the form.

FIELD.NAME: weekendid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the weekend associated with the record.

FIELD.NAME: departure_date_time
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for departure date and time.

FIELD.NAME: return_date_time
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for the return date and time.

FIELD.NAME: destination
FIELD.COMMENT: The student's destination.

FIELD.NAME: transportation
FIELD.COMMENT: The student's means of transportation.

FIELD.NAME: phone_number
FIELD.COMMENT: The phone number to contact.

FIELD.NAME: active
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag for whether the record is active. Only one record should ever be active for a given student and weekend.

FIELD.NAME: parent
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag for whether the record has received parent permission.

FIELD.NAME: invite
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag for whether the record has received invite permission.

FIELD.NAME: approved
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag for whether the record has received head of house approval.

FIELD.NAME: time_created
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the record was first created.

FIELD.NAME: time_modified
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the record was last modified.

KEY.NAME: user
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student.

KEY.NAME: weekend
KEY.COMMENT: The weekend record associated with the record.
